targets.query: SELECT sum("responses")/sum("requests") FROM "dns" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Responses to Requests Ratio for monitor: $network_monitor

targets.query: SELECT "requests", "response_time"  / 1000000, "responses", "packets", "request_time"  / 1000000,  "response_time" - "request_time" as "request delta" FROM "dns" WHERE ("responder_hostname" =~ /^$dns_responder$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "requester_ip", "responder_ip", "requester_hostname", "responder_hostname", "query_type_name", "transaction_id"

SELECT "requests", "response_time"  / 1000000, "responses", "packets", "request_time"  / 1000000,  "response_time" - "request_time" as "request delta" FROM "dns" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "query_type_name" != 'none') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "requester_ip", "responder_ip", "requester_hostname", "responder_hostname", "query_type_name", "transaction_id"

list.name: ip
list.query: show tag values with key=~/.*_ip/   LIMIT 100

list.name: application
list.query: show tag values with key= application_port
